#include<stdio.h>

typedef unsigned long int L;

int main()
{
  int t;
  L x,i,a,b,c,min;
  const L maxn=1000010;
  L arr[maxn];
  
  arr[1]=1;
  arr[2]=2;
  arr[3]=2;
  
  for(i=4;i<=maxn;i++)
  {
     min=100000000;
     if(i%2==0)
       min=arr[i/2];
     if(i%3==0)
       min=min<=arr[i/3]?min:arr[i/3];
     
     min=min<=arr[i-1]?min:arr[i-1];
     
     arr[i]=min+1;
  }
  
  scanf("%d",&t);
  
  while(t--)
  {
    scanf("%lu",&x);
    
    printf("%lu\n",arr[x]);
  }
  
  return 0;
}
